data.author: Cristiano Ronaldo
data.quote: If you don’t believe you are the best, then you will never achieve all that you are capable of.

data.author: Bob Marley
data.quote: The truth is , everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.

data.author: Brian Tracy
data.quote: Fake It Until You Make It! Act As If You Had All The Confidence You Require Until It Becomes Your Reality.

data.author: Brian Tracy
data.quote: Integrity Is The Most Valuable And Respected Quality Of Leadership. Always Keep Your Word.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: Knowledge without justice ought to be called cunning rather than wisdom.

data.author: Plato
data.quote: An empty vessel makes the loudest sound, so they that have the least wit are the greatest babblers.

data.author: Master Oogway
data.quote: There is always something more to learn. Even for a master.

data.author: Master Oogway
data.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, and today is a gift. That’s why they call it the present.

data.author: Vince Lombardi
data.quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.

data.author: Jackie Chan
data.quote: Life will knock us down, but we can choose to get back up.

data.author: Proverbs
data.quote: Better to die on your feet than live on your knees.

data.author: Robert Frost
data.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on

data.author: Robert Downy jr.
data.quote: Remember that just because you hit bottom doesn’t mean you have to stay there.

data.author: Dr. A.P.J Abdul Kalam
data.quote: If you want to shine like a sun, first burn like a sun.

data.author: Mark Twain
data.quote: To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence
